name: John Doe
bio: John Doe is a self-taught chef who has been passionate about cooking since childhood. He grew up watching his grandmother and mother cook and learned the art of traditional home cooking from them. Over the years, he has developed his own unique style of cooking, which is a blend of traditional and modern techniques. He is known for his simple, yet flavorful dishes that highlight the natural flavors of the ingredients. Chef John is also a popular food blogger and YouTuber, where he shares his recipes and cooking tips with a global audience.

recipes.cooking_method:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 
2. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add onions and garlic and sauté until onions are translucent. 
3. Add ground beef and cook until browned. 
4. Add diced tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes. 
5. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

name: Jane Smith
bio: Jane Smith is a classically trained chef with over 5 years of experience in the culinary industry. She has worked in some of the top restaurants in the world and is known for her innovative and creative approach to cooking. Her signature dishes are a fusion of traditional and modern flavors, and she is constantly experimenting with new techniques and ingredients. Chef Alice is passionate about teaching others how to cook and has authored several cookbooks and appeared on cooking shows to share her expertise with a wider audience.
